programme.title: Best of MTV Live: Iconic Videos!
programme.desc: These are the videos that will stay in your brain forever whether you liked them or not! MTV Live presents the best ever videos to air on the channel!

programme.title: Best of MTV Live: Biggest Music...
programme.desc: ...Moments. Let's take a look back at the biggest moments in music history, with songs that never left the charts and styles that take us back to a particular year!

programme.title: MTV's 50 Greatest Albums of The...
programme.desc: ...Century. Albums come and go but these 50 albums remain timeless no matter the year! Hosted by Becca Dudley, check out classic albums MTV adores and for good reason!

programme.title: Goodbye From MTV Live!
programme.desc: Join us as we say farewell to MTV Live and celebrate all of the incredible hits and videos that graced our screens over the years! Thank you for the music and thank YOU for watching!

NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about the autumn dates of kanro and soko. The nuns show us how to make the seasonal specialties gammodoki and gohei-mochi rice cakes.

programme.title: Dining With the Chef
programme.desc: Join Harry Sugiyama and chef Hayashi for a fresh, fast master class in ultra-simple Japanese cooking, where shrimp and eggs take the spotlight. Let's get cooking!

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: BIZ STREAM SPECIAL EDITION
programme.desc: Chemical-Free, Farmer-Friendly Agritech: This episode features innovative agricultural technology that is helping farmers to raise healthy crops while reducing reliance on pesticides.

programme.title: The Beauty of Japanese Swords
programme.desc: Japanese swords, admired since ancient times for their beauty, are amazing works of art. This time, Hotei Kunihiro, a sword conveying a swordsmith's wish for peace.

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: For over 150 years, Yamamoto Yasuo's family has made soy sauce in wooden barrels. This traditional method is close to dying out, but Yamamoto intends to keep it alive for future generations.

programme.title: trails to Oishii Tokyo mini 5min.
programme.desc: It's kuzu, a Japanese ingredient with over 1,000 years of history. Kuzu powder is used in many ways. Sweeten it to make a tasty treat, use it as a thickener, or sprinkle it on food to enhance umami.

programme.title: On the Wings 5min.
programme.desc: Hop on a plane and view Japan from the sky! It's nearly the apex of summer, and we're heading to the nature rich Amami Oshima Island, which recently became a UNESCO World Natural Heritage site.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Mt. Fuji's Faces
programme.desc: We observe "Red Fuji" and "Black Fuji," 2 dramatically different views of Japan's most famous mountain, captured by the artist Hokusai. What did Mount Fuji mean to the people of Edo?

programme.title: Living and Laughing with Illness
programme.desc: A Japanese organization in which people with mental illness discuss and consider how best to live rather than relying on doctors is spotlighted. We look closely at how they come to accept themselves.

programme.title: Document 72 hours
programme.desc: A public library in Kanazawa resembles a sublime theater and offers more than 1.1 million books. For three days, we asked people what books piqued their interest and how they spend their time here.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: MATSURI: The Heartbeat of Japan
programme.desc: In Saidaiji Eyo, thousands of near-naked men endure icy water and the winter cold as they are purified at a temple. Some of the normal rites are being reintroduced as the pandemic recedes.

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar

programme.title: Science View

programme.desc: Matsue is known as the "city of water." It is home to Lake Shinji, which is famous for its shijimi clams. Through beautiful time-lapse footage, we see the lake's changing colors and expressions.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: BIZ STREAM SPECIAL EDITION
programme.desc: 'Swiping Left' on Standard Dating: This episode focuses on matchmaking services that employ out-of-the-ordinary methods to help people find a partner.

programme.desc: A feudal lord admired by John F. Kennedy, Uesugi Yozan prioritized the well-being of his people. This time, in part two, we look at how his policies guided his domain along the path to sustainability.

programme.desc: This time in Wakayama, heartland of shoyu, we find a distinctive ramen culture pairing ramen and...sushi?!

programme.title: Trails to Oishii Tokyo
programme.desc: Visit specialty tofu makers across Tokyo that are deeply rooted in their local communities and see how the traditional food has come to be used in all kinds of cuisine, from east to west.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites in Japan
programme.desc: Mt. Fuji is Japan's tallest and most famous peak. It has long inspired awe and terror, and is a source of artistic inspiration. Join us to explore the iconic beauty of this famous mountain.

programme.title: Core Kyoto
programme.desc: In 1869, the emperor's move to Tokyo led Kyoto's economy and population into decline. A canal was dug as a last resort to revive the city. It still supplies water, generates power and boosts tourism.

programme.title: NHK NEWSLINE

programme.title: Nun's Seasonal Calendar
programme.desc: In this episode, we learn about rikka and shoman, two dates of early summer. The temple chefs teach us how to make kimpira stir fry with itadori and mehari-zushi (eye-popping sushi).

programme.title: Direct Talk
programme.desc: Tomita Hiroshi is the founder of a company that specializes in detecting underground cavities. He discusses how his technology is reducing risks and mitigating damage from all sorts of disasters.

programme.title: Herbal Symphony #4 Winter
programme.desc: In Uda, discover Japan's oldest private medicinal herb garden, where the natural landscape from 300 years ago is preserved in a botanical time capsule, a sanctuary of the local culture and history.

programme.title: Ukiyoe EDO-LIFE: Sudden Shower
programme.desc: Caught in an evening shower, Edo townspeople scramble across a bridge in search of shelter. On the river beyond, a lone figure steers his boat, unfazed by the rain. What is his destination?

programme.desc: Min Joon is shocked when he finds out Hae Sung had died in a car accident.Hae Sung approaches Min Joon's former employees to work for him again.

programme.title: Le goût des rencontres en Nouvelle-Aquitaine
Les petits meurtres d'Agatha Christie
programme.desc: Murders of the 3rd kind The presenter of the programme "Aux Frontières du Cosmos" is found murdered, in mysterious circumstances. With an investigation that seems totally surreal, Gréco needs to keep a cool head, particularly when Beretta falls under the charm of the astrophysicist sent to lend a hand, and starts believing in flying saucers. Directed by: Émilie Deleuze (season 3, France, 2022) Screenplay by: Hélène Lombard and Bertrand Soulier, based on the works of Agatha Christie Cast: Arthur Dupont (Max Beretta), Émilie Gavois-Kahn (Annie Gréco), Chloé Chaudoye (Rose Bellecour), Benoît Moret (Jacques Blum), Quentin Baillot (Servan Legoff), Nicolas Lumbreras (Bob), Emilie Caen (Sylvia Denaux), Marilyne Canto (Jacqueline Lacombe), Julien Pestel (Jean- Luc Bossuet) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Tendance XXI
programme.desc: A Parisian stroll down Rue de Turenne. African fashion is trending: proof in images with the Africa Fashion Up show, which propels young designers onto the international scene. Everything you need to know about the zip. William Amor turns plastic waste into flowers. Go for the all-white look. Commentary: Viviane Blassel

programme.title: Les chefs !
programme.desc: Episode 7 The remaining competitors must create a dish using a selection of unpopular ingredients in Quebec. Along the way, a surprise announcement shakes up all their plans. With the judges: Jean-Luc Boulay, Isabelle Deschamps Plante, Normand Laprise, Pasquale Vari; and the coach: Colombe St-Pierre Host: Élyse Marquis Directors: Jill Niquet-Joyal, Audrey Potvin (season 14, Canada, 2025)

programme.title: Basique, les sessions
programme.desc: Young artistes, each from a universe that's as rich as it is diverse, talk about themselves, their careers, their music, their influences...

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: The Maison des Canuts traces the long tradition of Lyon's gold, silver and silk weavers. Each creation by visual artist Sarah Valente sounds like a call from the forest. Zomer is turning fashion upside down. In Brittany, craftsman Thibaut Thierry works paper with seaweed. Presented by: Katherina Marx

programme.title: Rassemblance
programme.desc: Femi Akanho (Benin) Femi Akanho, alias Femi the Scorpion, is a dancer and choreographer from Benin who, despite familial opposition, trained discreetly since childhood. When he arrrived in France in 2016, he choreographed for the Opéra Garnier and the Théâtre de Chaillot, while continuing to dance in the street, to bring everyone together. Presenter: Magloire Delcros-Varaud Director: Océane Goanec (season 3, France, 2024)

programme.title: Vertigineuse Écosse
programme.desc: Discover a bold nature conservation project in Scotland, in the heart of the Highlands. Using a local law, an association trades noble titles for financial resources to develop and enrich local wildlife and flora. Directed by: Tanguy Dumortier (Belgium, 2017)

programme.title: C'est succulent !
programme.desc: Ham with Chablis Leïla Albert interviews Viviane Fouchères, a retired woman with a wide range of voluntary activities. She concocts her Burgundy recipe for ham with Chablis sauce. Presented by: Leïla Albert

programme.title: Version Française
programme.desc: The Maison des Canuts traces the long tradition of Lyon's gold, silver and silk weavers. Each creation by visual artist Sarah Valente sounds like a call from the forest. Zomer is turning fashion upside down. In Brittany, craftsman Thibaut Thierry works paper with seaweed. Presented by: Katherina Marx

programme.title: La nature va à l'école
programme.desc: Cloud Forests Cloud forests are a type of tropical rainforest found at high altitudes, often shrouded in mist. They are rich in biodiversity and play a crucial role in climate regulation and water conservation. Presentation: Georgia Rushton

programme.title: C'est succulent !
programme.desc: Ham with Chablis Leïla Albert interviews Viviane Fouchères, a retired woman with a wide range of voluntary activities. She concocts her Burgundy recipe for ham with Chablis sauce. Presented by: Leïla Albert

programme.title: Podium
programme.desc: Ice wave Nothing stops real surfing enthusiasts getting into the waters of the Saint Lawrence River, in the heart of Montreal, even with the Siberian temperatures of the coldest months of winter.

programme.title: Le goût des rencontres en Nouvelle-Aquitaine
Rocky & Lily: c'est dans la boîte !
programme.desc: c'est dans la boîte !

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
La fabuleuse histoire des sciences au Québec
programme.desc: The 1980s: science in the fight against AIDS AIDS first appeared at the beginning of the 1980s. As thousands died around the world from this incurable disease, doctors Bernard Belleau and Mark Wainberg helped identify the virus and develop 3TC, an antiretroviral drug. Directed by: Michel Barbeau (Canada, 2022)

programme.title: Les chefs !
programme.desc: Episode 8 For this 100% vegetarian challenge, the brigade must prepare a starter and a dessert, showcasing vegetables. With the judges: Jean-Luc Boulay, Isabelle Deschamps Plante, Normand Laprise, Pasquale Vari; and the coach: Colombe St-Pierre Host: Élyse Marquis Directors: Jill Niquet-Joyal, Audrey Potvin (season 14, Canada, 2025)

programme.title: Taratata numéro 600
programme.desc: It's an exceptional run for a music show! For over thirty years, Taratata has delivered thousands of unforgettable moments, unexpected encounters and memorable performances. In this space of freedom and trust, artists dare, surprise themselves and create unique experiences. Guests: Hugues Aufray, Axel Bauer, Bénabar, Patrick Bruel, Cali, Christine and the Queens, Claudio Capéo, Charlotte Cardin, Eddy de Pretto, Garou, Imany, Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark, Nolwenn Leroy, Clara Luciani, -M-, Ours, Matt Pokora, Catherine Ringer, Gaëtan Roussel, Aliocha Schneider, Alain Souchon, Pierre Souchon, Laurent Voulzy, Charlie Winston... Host: Nagui Director: Gérard Pullicino (France, 2025)

programme.title: Caroline Vigneaux: faut-il toujours dire la vérité aux enfants ?
programme.desc: This crucial question is the theme of Caroline Vigneaux's show at the opening gala of the Liège Laughter Festival. To answer these questions, the master of ceremonies will be able to count on the help and testimony of a number of comedians. With Antonia de Rendinger, Anne Roumanoff, les Bodin's, Viktor Vincent, les Frères Taloche, Florent Peyre, Anne Cahen, Laetitia Mampaka, Philippe Lellouche, Roman Doduik Written by: Caroline Vigneaux, Jocelyn Flipo Produced by: Caroline Vigneaux Directed by: Franck Villano (Belgium, 2024)

programme.title: Jeux d'influence
programme.desc: Episode 7 Anything goes when it comes to trying to stop Delpierre's parliamentary bill from progressing. Romain's murky past is used against him. Chloé is sectioned and held against her will in a specialist clinic for her so-called addiction. Claire is in danger and turns to Romain for help. Directed by: Jean-Xavier de Lestrade (France, 2018) Screenplay by: Antoine Lacomblez, Jean-Xavier de Lestrade, Sophie Hiet, Pierre Linhart Cast: Alix Poisson (Claire Lansel), Laurent Stocker (Guillaume Delpierre), Marie Dompnier (Florence Delpierre), Pierre Perrier (Romain Corso), Marilou Aussilloux (Chloé Forrest), Jean-François Sivadier (Mathieu Bowman), Marc Citti (Didier Forrest), Anne Coesens (Suzanne Forrest), Romann Berrux (Damien Forrest), Christophe Kourotchkine (Michel Villeneuve), Nathalie Boutefeu (Caroline Villeneuve) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Jeux d'influence
programme.desc: Episode 8 Romain tells Delpierre he is resigning. Despite everything the latter is determined to make a major modification to his amendment in order to protect it. Bowman obliges Claire to sign a termination of contract together with a non-disclosure clause. The battle seems all but lost... Directed by: Jean-Xavier de Lestrade (France, 2018) Screenplay by: Antoine Lacomblez, Jean-Xavier de Lestrade, Sophie Hiet, Pierre Linhart Cast: Alix Poisson (Claire Lansel), Laurent Stocker (Guillaume Delpierre), Marie Dompnier (Florence Delpierre), Pierre Perrier (Romain Corso), Marilou Aussilloux (Chloé Forrest), Jean-François Sivadier (Mathieu Bowman), Marc Citti (Didier Forrest), Anne Coesens (Suzanne Forrest), Romann Berrux (Damien Forrest), Christophe Kourotchkine (Michel Villeneuve), Nathalie Boutefeu (Caroline Villeneuve) Genre: thriller

programme.title: Un château en cadeau
programme.desc: André Manoukian invites his friend Bruno Solo for an extraordinary Christmas in the Château de Chenonceau. The pair share the magic of the festive season with a host of other guests on this uniquely enchanting journey. Guests: Nicoletta, singer; Julien Cohen, presenter; Joseph Kamel, singer; Jean-François Boucher, floral designer; Claire Damon, pastry chef. Presented by: André Manoukian Directed by: Vincent Dupouy (France, 2024)

programme.title: Basique, les sessions
programme.desc: Young artistes, each from a universe that's as rich as it is diverse, talk about themselves, their careers, their music, their influences...

programme.title: La grande soirée du 31
programme.desc: A magical evening in the heart of Paris to bring the year 2025 to a magnificent close. Brand-new performances to amaze you, numerous artists, grandiose sequences with the dancers of the Moulin Rouge and the Paradis Latin, tributes to musical comedies... And a spectacular fireworks display to usher in the new year. Guests: Keen'V, Amir, Gilbert Montagné, Pascal Obispo, Bénabar, Zaz, Magic System, Stars 80, Amel Bent, Salvatore Adamo, Claudio Capéo... Presented by: Stéphane Bern, Laury Thilleman. Directed by: François Goetghebeur (France, 2025)

programme.title: Comment ça va le Nord ?
programme.desc: New lifestyles: adaptation and self-sufficiency With only four hours of sunshine per day, winter in the Far North is particularly harmful for the environment as fossil fuels, such as diesel or propane, continue to provide the main source of electricity. Finding new ways of doing things is becoming crucial... Presented by: Simon D'Amours. Directed by: Joanie D. Gareau (Canada, 2021)

programme.title: Tout le monde veut prendre sa place
La fabuleuse histoire des sciences au Québec
programme.desc: The 1990s: new museum, new encounters! Any society, however young, inevitably develops a desire to know and understand the history of the land it treads. In 1992, historians and archaeologists were called on to work in close collaboration for the creation of the Pointe-à-Callière Museum, the Montreal Museum of Archaeology and History. Directed by: Michel Barbeau (Canada, 2022)

programme.title: Les chefs !
programme.desc: Episode 9 Jean-Christophe Poirier, the first Quebec chef awarded a Michelin star, asks the contestants to revisit two French classics with a Quebec twist. With the judges: Jean-Luc Boulay, Isabelle Deschamps Plante, Normand Laprise, Pasquale Vari; and the coach: Colombe St-Pierre Host: Élyse Marquis Directors: Jill Niquet-Joyal, Audrey Potvin (season 14, Canada, 2025)

programme.title: Le mystère Bardot
programme.desc: Who hides behind Brigitte Bardot? Extraordinarily photogenic, a tumultuous love life, the ultimate sex symbol for the 1950s and 1960s, the actress, singer and animal rights activist left an indelible mark on her era. Despite over 30,000 photos published in the press, her true personality has long-remained in the shadows. Directed by: Sophie Agacinski, Gilles Nadeau (France, 2012)

programme.title: Le grand rendez-vous de la Fédération Wallonie-Bruxelles
programme.desc: Joëlle Scoriels and Walid are back at the Grand-Place in Brussels to host a high-flying show featuring Belgian talent and pop culture! With: Alex Germys & DJ Licious feat. Alex Lucas, Alice on the roof, Camille Yembe, Charlotte Cardin, COLT, Laura, Lay This Drum!, Lou B, Mentissa, Orlane, Rori, Saule, Scylla, Typh Barrow, 2MAD, Axelle Red... Presented by: Joëlle Scoriels, Walid

programme.desc: Self-proclaimed tough guy Jae-Pil and sexy guy Sang-Gu move to a countryside home. A spirit sealed in the basement awakens, leading to a high-stimulus chilling comedy they'll never forget.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn't last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: I, the Executioner
programme.desc: Detective Seo Do-Cheol and rookie cop Park Sun-Woo investigate a murder which reveals links to past cases of a serial killer. The killer releases a teaser online and intesifies the chaos.

programme.title: Rebound
programme.desc: A rookie basketball coach lead 6 'no-body' players for straight matches in 8 days and turn the impossible possible.

programme.title: The Childe
programme.desc: A Kopino boxer goes to Korea to search for his estranged father for his mother's surgery, but his surroundings have turned into a mess after he met a mysterious man known as 'Nobleman'...

programme.title: Homeward Bound
programme.desc: Jung-ha's peaceful life changes when her son Jin-woo, who studies in Canada, and his girlfriend Jenny show up. They are forced to live together after a mishap with their lodging, and secrets surface.

programme.title: The Girl on a Bulldozer
programme.desc: As the girl seeks truth behind the sudden car accident of her father, anger and despair left her only one option.

programme.title: 6/45: Lucky Lotto
programme.desc: The excitement of winning a lottery ticket doesn't last long for sergeant Chun-woo as it accidentally ends up crossing the Military Demarcation Line. He must get his act together and find it again!

programme.title: The Swindlers
programme.desc: Though each has their own motives, unlikely individuals from different sides of the law allies together to achieve a common goal - trapping the world's most legendary con man.

programme.title: Train to Busan
programme.desc: While a zombie-virus breaks out in South Korea, passengers including a father and young daughter, a couple, and several students struggle to survive on the train from Seoul to Busan.

programme.title: The Roundup: Punishment
programme.desc: Ma Seok-Do investigates a drug-trafficking app, uncovers a link to an illegal organization. As Baek Chang-Gi terrorizes the gambling market, an alliance is formed to stop the threat.

programme.title: Long Live the King
programme.desc: Based on a popular web-based series, a mobster meets a headstrong lawyer who he falls in love with at first sight and ignites a desire to change for the better.

programme.title: Pilot
programme.desc: Han Jung-woo is a popular star pilot. He is unable to work in any company due to a momentary mistake. He later gets a job his sister's identity. But his new job is soon threatened...

programme.title: Citizen of a Kind
programme.desc: Duk-hee receives a call from a bank offering a loan. After sending money for fees, she realizes that was a scam. She receives another call one day. This time, it's a plea for help...

programme.title: Holy Night: Demon Hunters
programme.desc: A city descends into chaos, plagued by a demon and his followers. Holy Night, a special team steps in to bring justice to the forces of evil. Will they be able to save the world?

programme.title: A Taxi Driver
programme.desc: A widowed father and taxi driver takes a German reporter from Seoul to Gwangju to cover the 1980 uprising.

programme.title: Usury Academy
programme.desc: Kang-jin is bullied as the lowest-ranking boy at school with no presence and money. He starts a business on private loans by chance and soon rises to the top of the school hierarchy.

programme.title: Juror 8
programme.desc: Based on a true story, eight ordinary people of different backgrounds were selected as the first jury for a murder trial in South Korea in 2008.

programme.title: Veteran
programme.desc: A merciless detective hunts down a young and successful drug addict who always escapes from investigations with the help of his wealth and connections.
